content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft a jungle_fence I need to first craft jungle_planks. To craft jungle_planks I need to move 1 jungle_log from slot 12 to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 21}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}]
thought: I can now craft the jungle_planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
